verses.kjv: And the rulers of the people dwelt at Jerusalem: the rest of the people also cast lots, to bring one of ten to dwell in Jerusalem the holy city, and nine parts to dwell in other cities.
verses.ct: The leaders of the people settled in Jerusalem. The rest of the people drew lots so that 1 out of every 10 would move to Jerusalem, the holy city, while the other 9 would remain in the surrounding towns.

verses.kjv: And the people blessed all the men, that willingly offered themselves to dwell at Jerusalem.
verses.ct: The people praised everyone who volunteered to live in Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: Now these are the chief of the province that dwelt in Jerusalem: but in the cities of Judah dwelt every one in his possession in their cities, to wit, Israel, the priests, and the Levites, and the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon’s servants.
verses.ct: Here are the leading figures of the province who settled in Jerusalem. However, throughout the towns of Judah, people lived on their own property in their respective towns — ordinary Israelites, priests, Levites, temple servants, and descendants of Solomon's servants.

verses.kjv: And at Jerusalem dwelt certain of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin. Of the children of Judah; Athaiah the son of Uzziah, the son of Zechariah, the son of Amariah, the son of Shephatiah, the son of Mahalaleel, of the children of Perez;
verses.ct: Some members of the tribes of Judah and Benjamin settled in Jerusalem. From Judah: Athaiah son of Uzziah, son of Zechariah, son of Amariah, son of Shephatiah, son of Mahalaleel, from the descendants of Perez;

verses.kjv: And Maaseiah the son of Baruch, the son of Colhozeh, the son of Hazaiah, the son of Adaiah, the son of Joiarib, the son of Zechariah, the son of Shiloni.
verses.ct: also Maaseiah son of Baruch, son of Colhozeh, son of Hazaiah, son of Adaiah, son of Joiarib, son of Zechariah, son of Shiloni.

verses.kjv: All the sons of Perez that dwelt at Jerusalem were four hundred threescore and eight valiant men.
verses.ct: The total number of Perez's descendants living in Jerusalem was 468 capable men.

verses.kjv: And these are the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Joed, the son of Pedaiah, the son of Kolaiah, the son of Maaseiah, the son of Ithiel, the son of Jesaiah.
verses.ct: From Benjamin: Sallu son of Meshullam, son of Joed, son of Pedaiah, son of Kolaiah, son of Maaseiah, son of Ithiel, son of Jesaiah.

verses.kjv: And after him Gabbai, Sallai, nine hundred twenty and eight.
verses.ct: Following him were Gabbai and Sallai — 928 in all.

verses.kjv: And Joel the son of Zichri was their overseer: and Judah the son of Senuah was second over the city.
verses.ct: Joel son of Zichri was their supervisor, and Judah son of Senuah served as second in command over the city.

verses.kjv: Of the priests: Jedaiah the son of Joiarib, Jachin.
verses.ct: From the priests: Jedaiah son of Joiarib, and Jachin.

verses.kjv: Seraiah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, was the ruler of the house of God.
verses.ct: Seraiah son of Hilkiah, son of Meshullam, son of Zadok, son of Meraioth, son of Ahitub, was the chief official of the house of God.

verses.kjv: And their brethren that did the work of the house were eight hundred twenty and two: and Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pelaliah, the son of Amzi, the son of Zechariah, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchiah,
verses.ct: Their brothers who carried out the work of the house numbered 822. Also Adaiah son of Jeroham, son of Pelaliah, son of Amzi, son of Zechariah, son of Pashur, son of Malchiah,

verses.kjv: And his brethren, chief of the fathers, two hundred forty and two: and Amashai the son of Azareel, the son of Ahasai, the son of Meshillemoth, the son of Immer,
verses.ct: along with his brothers who were heads of families — 242 of them. Also Amashai son of Azareel, son of Ahasai, son of Meshillemoth, son of Immer,

verses.kjv: And their brethren, mighty men of valour, an hundred twenty and eight: and their overseer was Zabdiel, the son of one of the great men.
verses.ct: and their brothers, 128 brave warriors. Their supervisor was Zabdiel, a descendant of one of the prominent families.

verses.kjv: Also of the Levites: Shemaiah the son of Hashub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Bunni;
verses.ct: From the Levites: Shemaiah son of Hashub, son of Azrikam, son of Hashabiah, son of Bunni;

verses.kjv: And Shabbethai and Jozabad, of the chief of the Levites, had the oversight of the outward business of the house of God.
verses.ct: Shabbethai and Jozabad, two of the leading Levites, were responsible for the external operations of the house of God.

verses.kjv: And Mattaniah the son of Micha, the son of Zabdi, the son of Asaph, was the principal to begin the thanksgiving in prayer: and Bakbukiah the second among his brethren, and Abda the son of Shammua, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun.
verses.ct: Mattaniah son of Micha, son of Zabdi, son of Asaph, was the one who led the thanksgiving during prayer. Bakbukiah held second rank among his brothers, and then Abda son of Shammua, son of Galal, son of Jeduthun.

verses.kjv: All the Levites in the holy city were two hundred fourscore and four.
verses.ct: The total number of Levites in the holy city was 284.

verses.kjv: Moreover the porters, Akkub, Talmon, and their brethren that kept the gates, were an hundred seventy and two.
verses.ct: The gatekeepers — Akkub, Talmon, and their brothers who guarded the gates — numbered 172.

verses.kjv: And the residue of Israel, of the priests, and the Levites, were in all the cities of Judah, every one in his inheritance.
verses.ct: The remaining Israelites, along with the priests and Levites, lived throughout all the towns of Judah, each on their own inherited land.

verses.kjv: But the Nethinims dwelt in Ophel: and Ziha and Gispa were over the Nethinims.
verses.ct: The temple servants lived on the hill of Ophel, with Ziha and Gispa serving as their leaders.

verses.kjv: The overseer also of the Levites at Jerusalem was Uzzi the son of Bani, the son of Hashabiah, the son of Mattaniah, the son of Micha. Of the sons of Asaph, the singers were over the business of the house of God.
verses.ct: The supervisor of the Levites in Jerusalem was Uzzi son of Bani, son of Hashabiah, son of Mattaniah, son of Micha. He was from the descendants of Asaph, the musicians who were in charge of the services at the house of God.

verses.kjv: For it was the king’s commandment concerning them, that a certain portion should be for the singers, due for every day.
verses.ct: The king had issued an official order regarding them, establishing a fixed daily provision for the musicians.

verses.kjv: And Pethahiah the son of Meshezabeel, of the children of Zerah the son of Judah, was at the king’s hand in all matters concerning the people.
verses.ct: Pethahiah son of Meshezabeel, from the descendants of Zerah son of Judah, served as the king's representative in all public affairs.

verses.kjv: And for the villages, with their fields, some of the children of Judah dwelt at Kirjatharba, and in the villages thereof, and at Dibon, and in the villages thereof, and at Jekabzeel, and in the villages thereof,
verses.ct: As for the rural settlements and surrounding farmland, some people of Judah lived in Kirjatharba and its villages, in Dibon and its villages, and in Jekabzeel and its villages,

verses.kjv: And at Jeshua, and at Moladah, and at Bethphelet,
verses.ct: in Jeshua, Moladah, Bethphelet,

verses.kjv: And at Hazarshual, and at Beersheba, and in the villages thereof,
verses.ct: Hazarshual, Beersheba and its villages,

verses.kjv: And at Ziklag, and at Mekonah, and in the villages thereof,
verses.ct: Ziklag, Mekonah and its villages,

verses.kjv: And at Enrimmon, and at Zareah, and at Jarmuth,
verses.ct: Enrimmon, Zareah, Jarmuth,

verses.kjv: Zanoah, Adullam, and in their villages, at Lachish, and the fields thereof, at Azekah, and in the villages thereof. And they dwelt from Beersheba unto the valley of Hinnom.
verses.ct: Zanoah, Adullam and their villages, Lachish and its surrounding fields, and Azekah and its villages. So they occupied the territory from Beersheba all the way to the valley of Hinnom.

verses.kjv: The children also of Benjamin from Geba dwelt at Michmash, and Aija, and Bethel, and in their villages,
verses.ct: The people of Benjamin settled from Geba onward, in Michmash, Aija, Bethel and its villages,

verses.kjv: And at Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
verses.ct: Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,

verses.kjv: Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
verses.ct: Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,

verses.kjv: Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
verses.ct: Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,

verses.kjv: Lod, and Ono, the valley of craftsmen.
verses.ct: Lod, Ono, and the valley of craftsmen.

verses.kjv: And of the Levites were divisions in Judah, and in Benjamin.
verses.ct: Some divisions of the Levites from Judah were reassigned to Benjamin.
